Package wellen

Class ADSR

java.lang.Object
wellen.ADSR
All Implemented Interfaces:
DSPNodeOutput
public class ADSR
extends java.lang.Object
implements DSPNodeOutput
envelope with (A)ttack (D)ecay (S)ustain (R)elease stages: ADSR

it is usually used to control the amplitude of an *oscillator*. 


                |----->|-->|   |-->|
                |---A--|-D-|-S-|-R-|
                |      /\
                |     /  \
                |    /    \_____
                |   /        ^  \
                |  /         |   \
                | /          |    \
                |/___________|_____\
                |
                |Press          |Release
